name: Not Enough Time (GoldenDEagler)
description:
You wake up and find yourself inside a time loop. A mystery tower standing above the town must be the key to escape this place. Move fast and collect more time to reach it..

A prototype game made for the Untitled Game Jam. Theme: "loop"

==================================================

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

Space - Jump

E - interact

Esc - pause

==================================================

Assets taken from the Unity Asset Store:
